====================================

.. py:class:: Liquid(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = opts.InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = opts.RenderOpts())

   Bases: :py:obj:`pyecharts.charts.chart.Chart`


   <<< Liquid >>>

   The liquid chart is mainly used to highlight the percentage of data.


   .. py:method:: add(series_name: str, data: pyecharts.types.Sequence, *, shape: str = 'circle', color: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Sequence[str]] = None, background_color: pyecharts.types.Union[str, dict, None] = None, is_animation: bool = True, is_outline_show: bool = True, outline_border_distance: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 8, outline_itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None, center: pyecharts.types.Sequence = None, tooltip_opts: pyecharts.types.Tooltip = None, label_opts: pyecharts.types.Label = opts.LabelOpts(font_size=50, position='inside'))
